name: Task Donegeon - 0.0.58 - First Release
lastChange: Fixed a bug where theme selections on the Appearance page and edits in the Theme Editor would reset during data syncs. Overhauled the Theme Editor with a live dashboard preview and over 30 new fonts.
description: A gamified task and chore tracker for families and groups. Complete quests, earn currency and experience, and level up your character in a fun, medieval-themed adventure.
